author: huths0lo
title: Hive Mind cNFT Policy ID Validation
description: There is currently only one significant resource for cNFT Policy verification.  This creates bottlenecks that can be easily fixed.
solution: My solution is to work with multiple trusted community members, to create multiple repositories, with a community trust model.
experience: Early cNFT creator, Cardano Developer, Principal Network Engineer, 25 years of IT Experience.
